mapper.select: select b.*,m.modular_name from SYS_BUTTON b left join SYS_MODULAR m ON b.modular_id= m.id where modular_id=#{modularId} order by sort_num
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_BUTTON ( id, button_name, sort_num, status, modular_id ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buttonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modularId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select sb.button_name name from SYS_USER_ROLE sur left join SYS_ROLE_BUTTON srb on sur.role_id = srb.role_id left join SYS_BUTTON sb on sb.id = srb.button_id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and srb.modular_id = #{modularId}
